text: Fhe Bakɨme nden farasarigim, nde ana gumgi gu mbigi kim, ana guigira won ndavar nde nɨɨŋgi. Maaŋ muuŋgiap, nde mba khesharigi tɨvi zɨn ŋgɨri. Nde guigira warir korar muuŋv, tɨvar vhuuŋra warir muuŋri. Nde guigira wari mbevav, nde mbarara harigi gumgi ga suaŋv, tɨva mbatɨgen nde muuŋgi guma, nde vhemkora ana suaŋv ndav shi thari.
